snippet: The grants are intended to help the projects, off the coasts of New Jersey, Oregon and Virginia, begin delivering electricity by 2017.
abstract: Department of Energy pledges up to $47 million each to three offshore wind projects it previously supported; grants are intended to help projects, off the coasts of New Jersey, Oregon and Virginia, begin delivering electricity by 2017.

byline.original: By DIANE CARDWELL and MATTHEW L. WALD

lead_paragraph: The grants are intended to help the projects, off the coasts of New Jersey, Oregon and Virginia, begin delivering electricity by 2017.
